record.field: # SERVER ACTION: import datetime instead of fields from datetime import date today = date.today().isoformat() session = env['pos.session'].search([('state','!=','closed')], limit=1) data = {'date_start': today, 'date_stop': today, 'session_id': session.id} report = env['ir.actions.report']._get_report_from_name('pos_daily_rma_report_no_wizard.template_pos_daily_rma') action = report.report_action([], data=data) action
